author: jmsnell
msg: Incorporates Retroweaver into the ant build.
Both the JDK 1.5 and JDK 1.4.2 jars will be in the "dist" folder, with the 1.4.2 jars suffixed with "retro".
There is one additional dependency (retroweaver-rt-1.2.3.jar) for the 1.4.2 jars that is copied to the dist/lib directory.

msg: O.K., now the generic widget is really in there; also a flag for Utils-based loading in the call to Xap.bootstrap()---that version of Xap will not be checked in until I make sure that it's not the problem with a coupld of unit tests gone bad....
